H0.text: The contract of footballer Nicolas Anelka was terminated after he made an offensive gesture, what name was given to the gesture. Nazi Salute

H1.text: The contract of footballer Nicolas Anelka was terminated after he made an offensive gesture, what name was given to the gesture. Reverse Hitler

H2.text: The contract of footballer Nicolas Anelka was terminated after he made an offensive gesture, what name was given to the gesture. Anti-Establishment Sign

H3.text: The contract of footballer Nicolas Anelka was terminated after he made an offensive gesture, what name was given to the gesture. Quenelle

A4.text: The quenelle (French: [kə.nɛl]) is a gesture created and popularized by French comedian Dieudonné.

A5.text: Jewish leaders, anti-racism groups, and public officials in France have interpreted it as an inverted Nazi salute and as an expression of antisemitism.
